name: The Mystery of the Crystal Portal 2: Beyond the Horizon
name_original: The Mystery of the Crystal Portal 2: Beyond the Horizon
description:
The Mystery of the Crystal Portal 2: Beyond the Horizon is a game developed by Artogon Games. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play The Mystery of the Crystal Portal 2: Beyond the Horizon on PC.
